attributes.action: Stop people arguing about the result! Agree to disagree UNITE TO REBUILD GBR!
attributes.additional_details:
The referendum has divided friendships and families and whilst it is going to be difficult for awhile and uncertain if we unite we can put it right. Discussions are going to help that healing process, name-calling  and bullying will just split the country further.
At the moment we don't know who to believe  so stand together tall and firm for what we want
attributes.background:
FACT The result is OUT
FACT Arguing or bullying won't change it
FACT We need to unite to make it work not prove it wont
FACT The rest of the world is watching
FACT The majority are sensible - don't let a minority turn this into a circus.
FACT This country is great LETS SHOW THE WORLD NOW
